thread.section_title: B&H Photo-Video Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of B&H Photo-Video | www.bhphotovideo.com | 87 of 7354
thread.title: Anonymous

author: Anonymous
title: Anonymous
text: It was a generally positive experience. The things I ordered were priced fairly low and 1 was even discounted. Both of the items showed to be "In Stock" but when I called to verify it the sales department had closed early (I called a little after 1:00 PM on Friday) so I hope the website was up-to-date. If they're in fact delivered on time I'll be a happy camper.
